column1: Heidi, sweetie, I'm just gonna set the snacks over here.
Oh, and Heidi, there's going to be one extra girl coming to your slumber party.
The new girl in your class, Marjorine.
I know, sweetie, but I got a call from Marjorine's mother.

She said Marjorine is having a really hard time being in a new school. Her mom asked me personally if we could have Marjorine over, and besides, her mother told me that she works as a state official and that I should  respect her authoratay.
Marjorine, sweetie your mom's on the phone.
